name: Farmageddon (itch) (carson.einarsen)
description:
The world is ending. 

The only thing between Hell and armageddon are six chickens. 

Too bad they won't sit still.

---

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 this game is in the very early, rough stages. You play as Farmer Abby who has to defend her farm, the last bastion of humanity, from the denizens of Hell. Your only weapon are the chickens on your farm. They don't really know it's armageddon though.

WASD - Move

V, Left Click - Throw Chicken

Credits:

Nick Yu - Art

Sean Porio - Music/SFX

Carson Einarsen - Programming

Connor Einarsen - Ideation/Moral Support/Stuck in a Basement
